responsibilities: Coordinate multi-channel social media campaigns, increasing organic engagement by 20% across LinkedIn and Instagram.
Monitor and report on monthly KPI performance using Google Analytics to inform strategy adjustments.
Draft and edit copy for weekly email newsletters and promotional blasts for a customer base of 15,000.
Collaborate with the design team to ensure all brand assets align with current marketing objectives.
Assisted the content lead in performing SEO keyword research for the corporate blog.
Curated and scheduled daily posts for various social media platforms using Hootsuite.
Conducted market research on competitor pricing and promotional tactics to identify industry trends.
Supported the event marketing team in organizing logistics for local trade shows and networking events.
